comments.body:
It would be great to put the comments alongside the change in the code. Same for the change below.
Thanks for the catch.
@protoget Thanks for the review.  I've added an explanatory comment to each of the changes.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +570,574 @@          # implementations of sqrt are not guaranteed to produce exactly the
          # same results. Therefore, an exact comparison cannot be made.
          self.assertAllClose(simple, array_ops.gather(params_norm, ids).eval())
          # Run a few different sharded versions.
          for procs in 1, 2, 3:

comments.body:
I'd probaby put details about the "AVX512 builds as the
embedding operation makes use of Eigen's fast vectorized square root
algorithm for doubles" etc.
@protoget I've updated the comments to explicitly mention the AVX512 builds.
@protoget Does the updated comment read okay to you now?  If not, I'm happy to change it.

          # Run a few different sharded versions.
